name: One Key (doubleyew)
description:
as the three of them sat there they all looked at each other... silent. K opens his mouth... "why? " he says . after a brief moment C responds "there is no reason we all have work anyway... As he says this they all realize they wouldn't be able to finish their AMAZING game anyway... They all walk off the balcony together I in a beautiful display of teamwork i realize, as an unpaid intern i never get any credit. i decide to clone them now I CALL THE SHOTS! As i give them they're tasks they all start ingnoring me i have no clue how they even  get work done they were just looking at memes! I killed them...  I then made a super clone that joined all three of them together they worked diligently they were like a child to me... i left to make ramen and came back ... they had started eating each other i ... i had to kill it ... nothing will fill this void that i now feel in my life.

 have fun i hope you enjoy one key 

H
